items.title: Self-learning & Continuous Training
items.description: Acquired advanced knowledge in PHP, MySQL, WordPress, Laravel, React.js, Next.js, JavaScript, and modern front-end technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, jQuery, and SASS through continuous learning, online courses, and practical projects.

items.title: Freelance Web Designer
items.description: Delivered professional landing page designs, graphic assets, and website templates. Focused on clean, attractive designs and offering multiple formats (JPG, PDF, PNG) with revisions to meet client expectations.

items.title: Frontend Developer & Designer
items.description: Created visually appealing, user-friendly interfaces with responsive designs. Delivered modern layouts tailored to target audiences, ensuring high usability across all devices.

items.title: Full Stack Web Developer
items.description: Specialized in designing and developing responsive websites and landing pages with a professional approach. Provided optimization services such as speed improvement, security setup, and SEO-friendly structures.
